title: Perm Champ Shards
body:
This is getting a little out of control. 
Any chance of being able to convert these into something a little more useful in the near future?

replies.body: How did you get so many perm shards? OML.

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GFBW9tFT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-25T11:28:14.285+0000)
>
> How did you get so many perm shards? OML.

Some of us have all champions, other than making 150-300 blue essence they are useless. getting mastery is the only way to use up that essence, essentially the only other way is to re roll them into a new champ that comes out, essentially not ahving to put any time or effort into getting them with IP or RP

As someone who has 12 Rune pages full and has changed usernames about 8 times over the past year or so, I can honestly say im not too stressed spending the LP, now I seem to be having the issue of Gemstones, now that i've got both Soulstealer skins and am one gemstone off of getting the ward, guess i'll start saving.
Scratch that, owns all hextech skins.

yeah, owned all champs for the past three seasons.
I just spend, a shit load of money on this game, about $50 a week aha.
We can also use the ones we dont need for masteries to get the new champs more cheaply.  Just reroll whenever a new champ is released.
You can use them to get lvl 6-7 champ mastery
Yeah, I guess, but i mean, I have two Jax shards, its getting beyond the point of necessity.
